title: Quarkus 1.10.5.Final released - Bugfixes
content: 1.10.5.Final is a maintenance release. It is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.10. If you are not using 1.10 already, please refer to the 1.10 migration guide. Whatâ€™s new? This release is a maintenance release. It fixes some important issues in Quarkus, most notably in the Hibernate ORM...
